about_the_game:
This is free Demo version of game


The aliens lived in relative peace in their part of space until humans invented faster-than-light travel. The humans occupied the mother planet and the surrounding ufok space stations.

Turn-based combat


Lead a team of aliens in ferocious turn-based clashes filled with lasers. Use your position and cover to dispose of enemies and keep your aliens alive. Upgrade your gear and equipment between clashes.

Unique skills and items


Use alien skills to get rid of enemies faster. Use grenades, poison and other unusual items, or shoot them with your laser gun.

Infiltration


Get through security to steal people's data. Complete the mission quietly without alerting any enemies or firing a single shot.

Music

Breathtaking paranormal music composed by Pawel Blaszczak, creator of the music for such games as The Witcher 3: Wild Game and Dying Light.

In demo version:

  • Science fiction in the old style.
  • 2 weapons.
  • 2 skills.
  • Slice of story.
  • One level.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence towards adults and aliens. Blood and body parts of humans and aliens can be seen.

name: Get Out Of My Space Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 3.1 GHz / Intel Core i3 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R7 260X (2 GB) / GeForce GTX 550 Ti (1 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II X4 3.1 GHz / Intel Core i5 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 380 / GeForce GTX 960 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: These damned people have been reigning in our part of space for too long. They kidnap our people and conduct experiments on them. We cannot afford to be treated like this.
